title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 43-1.14 - Recovery
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 43-1.14 - Recovery

State Regulations

Local health officials shall oversee all provider efforts to identify third-party coverage and to be able to demonstrate on audit that such third-party coverage was identified and fully utilized and that the providers adhered to the terms of this Subpart. Upon receipt of audit information by the State Health Department showing State aid overpayment, the commissioner shall deduct from the next State aid voucher the amount previously overpaid. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
43-1.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
